lead_paragraph: The town of Bornheim made the move after receiving complaints that some women were sexually harassed at the pool, with officials saying that breaching German cultural norms was a red line that should not be crossed.

headline.main: German Town Bars Male Asylum Seekers From Its Public Pool
headline.print_headline: German Town Bars Male Asylum Seekers From Its Public Pool
